blur_detection.description: The receipt shows clear, well-defined text with good edge definition and minimal blurring.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text clarity is sufficient for accurate OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt exhibits excellent contrast between black text and white paper background.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No improvement needed for contrast as the current level is ideal for OCR processing.

glare_identification.description: Minor glare is present on the right side of the receipt but does not affect text readability.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action needed as the minimal glare does not impact information extraction.

water_stains.description: No water stains, discoloration, or liquid damage detected on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: No action needed as the document is free from water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt shows slight curvature but no significant folds or tears that affect text legibility.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed as the minor curvature does not impact information extraction.

cut_off_detection.description: The receipt is fully captured within the frame with no cut-off edges or missing content.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No action needed as the entire receipt is visible in the image.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with all standard sections present including header, line items, tax, and totals.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed as all essential receipt sections are present.

obstructions.description: Fingers are visible holding the receipt at the edges but do not obscure any relevant content.
obstructions.recommendation: No action needed as the fingers do not obstruct any important receipt information.
